init.characterSays: A new merchant. I bet you paid a lot to get here. What were you hoping to get in Shikyomo

responses.text: I came to learn about Shikyomo
I came to help the resistance
I just kind of ended up here

turn_back.characterSays: Well turn back now. The king runs the market. He decides who profits and who starves. He only allows outsiders to come so he can wring them dry.

came_for_city.characterSays: Well, Shikyomo is a once great city being run to the ground by a mad king and his foolish schemes.

came_for_resistance.characterSays: Has word spread to the mainland? Well you're talking to the right person. Would you mind distributing these for the cause?

responses.text: I'll have nothing to do with this
Will I get in trouble for distributing these?

came_for_nothing.characterSays: Well, perhaps your indifferent outlook can be used for good. Would you mind distributing these for me.

responses.text: I'll have nothing to do with this
Will I get in trouble for distributing these?

will_help.characterSays: Would you mind distributing these signs of resistance for the cause?

responses.text: I'll have nothing to do with this
Will I get in trouble for distributing these?

wont_help.characterSays: Wait, would you mind distributing these signs for me?

responses.text: I'll have nothing to do with this
Will I get in trouble for distributing these?

will_leave.characterSays: Well since you're leaving, would you mind distributing these signs for me?

responses.text: I'll have nothing to do with this
Will I get in trouble for distributing these?

wont_leave.characterSays: Well since you're staying, would you mind distributing these signs for me?

responses.text: I'll have nothing to do with this
Will I get in trouble for distributing these?

what_is_meaning.characterSays: It is a symbol of significance that has come to represent resistance against the king and his many plans.

responses.text: I'll have nothing to do with this
Will I get in trouble for distributing these?

ask_trouble.characterSays: Yes, it is illegal to own or display this symbol in Shikyomo. Be careful who you give these to.

responses.text: I'll have nothing to do with this

wont_distribute.characterSays: I understand. If you have a change of heart, come see me and I'll provide any symbols you need.

will_distribute.characterSays: Thank you. Remember, don't get caught and you didn't get these from me. But if you run out, find me for more.
